sources.title: Banco Latinoamericano de Comercio Exterior - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Banco Latinoamericano de Comercio Exterior, S.A. (English: Foreign Trade Bank of Latin America, known as Bladex, its commercial trademark) is a multinational bank.Founded in 1977 as Banco Latinoamericano de Exportaciones, S.A. and renamed in June 2009, [1] the company is headquartered in Panama City and finances Latin America and the Caribbean foreign trade.
